key.name: compress-backups
key.description: After backup has completed syncing compress it as a GZipped tar file. Note that this often makes backups take much longer and the disk will still be required to have enough space to hold the backup uncompressed.

key.name: backup-automatically
key.summary: Automatically backup on a timer if a target is available.

key.name: create-snapshots
key.description: Before creating a new backup snapshot the existing backup. It will be compressed and stored with the date it was taken. If this would make the total number of snapshots greater than maximum-snapshots then the oldest snapshot will be deleted.

key.name: max-snapshots
key.description: Maximum number of snapshots to keep. When a new snapshot would be created that would cause the current total to be greater than this number we delete the oldest snapshot.

key.name: backup-targets
key.summary: Where to backup to. Is either a Disk UUID or a folder.
